topic.title: EMERGENCY CARE PLACE OF INJURY (SNOMED CT)
topic.shortdesc: EMERGENCY CARE PLACE OF INJURY (SNOMED CT) is the SNOMED CT® concept ID which is used to identify the type of LOCATION at which the PATIENT was present when the injury occurred.
